parks.title: Gir National Park
parks.context: Gir Forest National Park is a wildlife sanctuary in Gujarat, western India. It was established to protect Asiatic lions

parks.title: Kanha Tiger Reserve
parks.context: Kanha National Park, also known as Kanha Tiger Reserve, is a vast expanse of grassland and forest in the central Indian state of Madhya Pradesh.

parks.title: Ranthambore National Park
parks.context: Ranthambore National Park is a national park in Rajasthan, India, with an area of 1,334 km².

parks.title: Jim Corbett National Park
parks.context: Jim Corbett National Park is a national park in India located in the Nainital district of Uttarakhand state.

forts.title: Mehrangarh Fort
forts.context: Mehrangarh Fort is one of the biggest forts in India. Quintessential beauty of this fort coaxes travellers as well as the big movies industries.

forts.title: Red Fort
forts.context: The Red Fort or Lal Qila is a historic fort in Old Delhi, Delhi in India that served as the main residence of the Mughal Emperors.

forts.title: Agra Fort
forts.context: Agra is one of the most famous tourist destinations in India. Yet another reason to visit this city is for the majestic Agra Fort.

forts.title: Jhansi Fort
forts.context: This is the fort in which brave queen of Jhansi – Rani Laxmi Bai used to live.

forts.title: Golconda Fort
forts.context: Golconda Fort is located at a place called Golconda which is around 11 kilometres away from the Hyderabad city. This fort is truly an architectural marvel.
